snippet.title: Gryphon Knight Epic - Console Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
We’ve been told many times the same tale: A knight who defeats all the odds to beat a maleficent beast and take the princess off its claws, and then comes back to the kingdom with his pockets full of shiny coins. But what happens next? 

Not all epic stories have this “happily ever after” written at the end of the journey! Brazilian developer Cyber Rhino Studios is bringing its medieval 2D shoot’em up Gryphon Knight Epic to PS4 on March 29, and to Xbox One on March 30.
